mapper.select: select p.p_no, pd.pd_scene, pd.pd_image, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_url, p.p_address, p.p_daddress from product p inner join product_detail pd on p.p_no = pd.p_no where p.p_no = #{pNo} and p.p_check like lower('y')
mapper.insert: insert into product (p_no, m_no, w_no, p_name, p_price, p_url, p_address, p_daddress, p_check, p_view, p_date) values (product_no_seq.nextval, #{mNo}, #{wNo}, #{pName}, #{pPrice}, #{pUrl}, #{pAddress}, #{pDaddress}, #{pCheck}, #{pView}, sysdate)
insert into product_detail (pd_no, p_no, pd_image, pd_scene) values (pd_no_seq.nextval, #{pNo}, #{pdImage}, #{pdScene})
mapper.update: update product set p_name = #{pName}, p_price = #{pPrice}, p_url = #{pUrl}, p_address = #{pAddress}, p_daddress = #{pDaddress}, p_check = #{pCheck}, p_view = #{pView}, p_date = sysdate where p_no = #{pNo}
update product_detail set pd_image = #{pdImage}, pd_scene = #{pdScene} where pd_no = #{pdNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member m inner join company c on m.m_no = c.m_no where m.m_no = #{mNo} and lower(c.co_check) = 'n'
